blog.content:
I wrote on my personal blog, which gets heavily abused for tech stuff, it was time for a tech blog. I wrote that about a year ago.

So, I guess now is the time for a tech blog. Rolled my own (as I do with my cigarettes) as I needed less then anything and wanted to do it with Rails (As I love Ruby and like to write code).

You are looking @ it now. Have a peek over on github to see how it is done (The coolest features are, as always, only available to those that are enabled - it does dragging and dropping of tags and such).

I hope to enlighten you with my tech scribbles real soon so I can unload my private WordPress blog.
blog.title: Time for a tech blog
